name: Watered Down Waste
description: This Game was made as part of a 48 hour hackathon. The theme was to create something nautical themed. Our team decided to make a game about the environment, we realized that it was the most pressing matter regarding ocean life, and decided to make a game to raise awareness all sprites, music and code was produced during the 48 hour window from Friday July 17th at 10:00 AM to Sunday July 19th at 10:00 AM.
